ğ±t+1subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1} =ğ±tâˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Î”~t.absentsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿subscript~Î”ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\eta_{L}\tilde{\Delta}_{t}.
Lemma 1 (Bounded Variance of Stochastic Local Updates for ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³\mathsf{FAT}-ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€\mathsf{Clipping}-ğ–¯ğ–±ğ–¯ğ–±\mathsf{PR}).

Assume fiâ€‹(ğ±,Î¾)subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ±ğœ‰f_{i}(\mathbf{x},\xi) satisfies the Bounded Î±âˆ’limit-fromğ›¼\alpha-Moment assumptionÂ 3, then for ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³\mathsf{FAT}-ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€\mathsf{Clipping}-ğ–¯ğ–±ğ–¯ğ–±\mathsf{PR}~{}we have:

ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}] â‰¤K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentsuperscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},
ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2} â‰¤K2mâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentsuperscriptğ¾2ğ‘šsuperscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{K^{2}}{m}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},
â€–1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2superscriptnorm1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2} â‰¤L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±.absentsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}.

Note here the expectation is on the random samples Î¾t,iksuperscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜\xi_{t,i}^{k}.

Proof.
ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}] =maxiâˆˆ[m]â¡ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~t,iâ€–2]absentsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle=\max_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}\|^{2}]
â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~t,jâ€–Î±]â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±absentğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘—ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,j}\|^{\alpha}]\lambda^{2-\alpha}
â‰¤Kâ€‹âˆ‘kâˆˆKğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t,jk,Î¾t,jk)â€–Î±]â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±absentğ¾subscriptğ‘˜ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘—ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq K\sum_{k\in K}\mathbb{E}[\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t,j}^{k},\xi_{t,j}^{k})\|^{\alpha}]\lambda^{2-\alpha}
â‰¤K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentsuperscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},

where j=aâ€‹râ€‹gâ€‹mâ€‹aâ€‹xiâˆˆ[m]â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~t,iâ€–2]ğ‘—ğ‘ğ‘Ÿğ‘”ğ‘šğ‘subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2j=argmax_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}\|^{2}], and the first inequality is due to the clipping, i.e., â€–Î”~t,iâ€–â‰¤Î»normsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğœ†\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}\|\leq\lambda.

ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2} =ğ”¼â€‹â€–1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m](Î”~t,iâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t,i])â€–2absentğ”¼superscriptnorm1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\left(\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}]\right)\right\|^{2}
â‰¤1m2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~t,iâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t,i]â€–2absent1superscriptğ‘š2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{m^{2}}\sum_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}]\|^{2}
â‰¤1m2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~t,iâ€–2absent1superscriptğ‘š2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{m^{2}}\sum_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}\|^{2}
â‰¤K2mâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±.absentsuperscriptğ¾2ğ‘šsuperscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{K^{2}}{m}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}.
â€–1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–â‰¤â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t]â€–+1Kâ€‹â€–ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t]âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–norm1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡normâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡1ğ¾normğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡\displaystyle\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|\leq\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\Delta_{t}]\right\|+\frac{1}{K}\left\|\mathbb{E}[\Delta_{t}]-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\right\|
â‰¤1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)â€–+1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]â€–ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t,iâˆ’Î”~t,i]â€–absent1ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾ğ”¼normâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜1ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šnormğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\mathbb{E}\left\|\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})\right\|+\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\left\|\mathbb{E}[\Delta_{t,i}-\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}]\right\|
â‰¤Lâ€‹Î·Lmâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆ[k]âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ij,Î¾t,ij)â€–+1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”t,iâ€–â€‹ğŸ{â€–Î”t,iâ€–â‰¥Î»}]absentğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾ğ”¼normsubscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘˜âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—1ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]normsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscript1normsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğœ†\displaystyle\leq\frac{L\eta_{L}}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\mathbb{E}\left\|\sum_{j\in[k]}\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{j},\xi_{t,i}^{j})\right\|+\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}[\left\|\Delta_{t,i}\right\|\mathbf{1}_{\{\|\Delta_{t,i}\|\geq\lambda\}}]
â‰¤Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹G+Kâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±absentğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğºğ¾superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq L\eta_{L}KG+KG^{\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}

where ğŸ{â‹…}subscript1â‹…\mathbf{1}_{\{\cdot\}} is the indicator function, the last inequality follows from the fact that Î”t,i=Î”~t,isubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–\Delta_{t,i}=\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i} if â€–Î”t,iâ€–â‰¤Î»normsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğœ†\|\Delta_{t,i}\|\leq\lambda and ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”t,iâ€–â€‹ğŸ{â€–Î”t,iâ€–â‰¥Î»}]â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”t,iâ€–Î±]â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±â‰¤K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±ğ”¼delimited-[]normsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscript1normsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğœ†ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼superscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\mathbb{E}[\left\|\Delta_{t,i}\right\|\mathbf{1}_{\{\|\Delta_{t,i}\|\geq\lambda\}}]\leq\mathbb{E}[\|\Delta_{t,i}\|^{\alpha}]\lambda^{1-\alpha}\leq K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}; the second last inequality is due to L-smoothness, Jensonâ€™s inequality (i.e.,ğ”¼[Î”t,iâˆ’Î”~t,i]âˆ¥â‰¤ğ”¼âˆ¥[Î”t,iâˆ’Î”~t,i]âˆ¥\mathbb{E}[\Delta_{t,i}-\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}]\|\leq\mathbb{E}\|[\Delta_{t,i}-\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}]\|) and the clipping step. Then, we have

â€–1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(x)â€–2â‰¤L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±superscriptnorm1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(x)\|^{2}\leq L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}

âˆ

See 1

Proof.
ğ”¼â€‹[â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]=ğ”¼â€‹[â€–ğ±tâˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Î”~tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿subscript~Î”ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-x_{*}\|^{2}]=\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\eta_{L}\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}]
=â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2+Î·2â€‹Î·L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]âˆ’2â€‹âŸ¨ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—,Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹(ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’Kâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)+Kâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t))âŸ©absentsuperscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡22subscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ¾âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ¾âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}+\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]-2\left<\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*},\eta\eta_{L}\left(\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-K\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})+K\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right)\right>
â‰¤(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2+Î·2â€‹Î·L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]âˆ’2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹âŸ¨ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—,(1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t))âŸ©absent1ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡22ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾subscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\leq(1-\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}+\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]-2\eta\eta_{L}K\left<\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*},\left(\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right)\right>
âˆ’2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹(fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—))2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle\quad-2\eta\eta_{L}K\left(f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*})\right)
â‰¤(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2+Î·2â€‹Î·L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]+8â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹KÎ¼â€‹â€–1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2absent112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡28ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğœ‡superscriptnorm1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}+\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]+\frac{8\eta\eta_{L}K}{\mu}\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}
âˆ’2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹(fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)).2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle\quad-2\eta\eta_{L}K\left(f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*})\right).

The first inequality follows from the strongly-convex property, i.e., âˆ’âŸ¨ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—,âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)âŸ©â‰¤âˆ’(fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)+Î¼2â€‹â€–xtâˆ’ğ±âˆ—â€–2)subscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğœ‡2superscriptnormsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡subscriptğ±2-\left<\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*},\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right>\leq-(f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*})+\frac{\mu}{2}\|x_{t}-\mathbf{x}_{*}\|^{2}), and the last inequality is due to Youngâ€™s inequality. Then we have

fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*}) â‰¤12â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹[âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]+(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]absent12ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾delimited-[]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥2112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2\eta\eta_{L}K}\left[-\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-x_{*}\|^{2}]+(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}\right]
+Î·â€‹Î·L2â€‹Kğ”¼[âˆ¥Î”~tâˆ¥2]+4Î¼âˆ¥ğ”¼[1KÎ”~tâˆ’âˆ‡f(ğ±t)âˆ¥2\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}}{2K}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]+\frac{4}{\mu}\|\mathbb{E}[\frac{1}{K}\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}
â‰¤12â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹[âˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]+(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2]absent12ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾delimited-[]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥2112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2\eta\eta_{L}K}\left[-\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-x_{*}\|^{2}]+(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}\right]
+Î·â€‹Î·L2â€‹Kâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±],ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ¾superscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}}{2K}K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}],

where the last inequality is due to LemmaÂ 1.

Let wt=(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)1âˆ’tsubscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾1ğ‘¡w_{t}=(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)^{1-t}, ğ±Â¯T=ğ±tsubscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘‡subscriptğ±ğ‘¡\bar{\mathbf{x}}_{T}=\mathbf{x}_{t} with probability wtâˆ‘jâˆˆ[T]wjsubscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘—\frac{w_{t}}{\sum_{j\in[T]}w_{j}}.

fâ€‹(xÂ¯T)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ‘¥ğ‘‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle f(\bar{x}_{T})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*}) â‰¤1âˆ‘jâˆˆ[T]wjâ€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T](wt2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹[âˆ’â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2+(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2])absent1subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥2112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{\sum_{j\in[T]}w_{j}}\sum_{t\in[T]}\left(\frac{w_{t}}{2\eta\eta_{L}K}\left[-\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-x_{*}\|^{2}+(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K)\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}\right]\right)
+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±]ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}]
â‰¤1âˆ‘jâˆˆ[T]wjâ€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T](12â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹[âˆ’wtâ€‹â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2+wtâˆ’1â€‹â€–ğ±tâˆ’xâˆ—â€–2])absent1subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡12ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾delimited-[]subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥2subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡1superscriptnormsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{\sum_{j\in[T]}w_{j}}\sum_{t\in[T]}\left(\frac{1}{2\eta\eta_{L}K}\left[-w_{t}\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-x_{*}\|^{2}+w_{t-1}\|\mathbf{x}_{t}-x_{*}\|^{2}\right]\right)
+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±]ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}]
â‰¤1âˆ‘jâˆˆ[T]wjâ€‹12â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹â€–ğ±1âˆ’xâˆ—â€–2absent1subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘—12ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ±1subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{\sum_{j\in[T]}w_{j}}\frac{1}{2\eta\eta_{L}K}\|\mathbf{x}_{1}-x_{*}\|^{2}
+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±],ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}],

where the second inequality follows from wtâ‰¤wtâˆ’1subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡1w_{t}\leq w_{t-1}.

2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]wt2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘¡\displaystyle 2\eta\eta_{L}K\sum_{t\in[T]}w_{t} =2â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’Tâ€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T](1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)tabsent2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘¡\displaystyle=2\eta\eta_{L}K\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T}\sum_{t\in[T]}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{t}
=4Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’Tâ€‹[1âˆ’(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)T]absent4ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡delimited-[]1superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle=\frac{4}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T}\left[1-\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{T}\right]
â‰¥4Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’Tâ€‹[1âˆ’expâ¡(âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T)]absent4ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡delimited-[]112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle\geq\frac{4}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T}\left[1-\exp{\left(-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}KT\right)}\right]
â‰¥2Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’T,absent2ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle\geq\frac{2}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T},

where the last inequality follows from that Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ‰¥2Î¼â€‹Tğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2ğœ‡ğ‘‡\eta\eta_{L}K\geq\frac{2}{\mu T}, the second last inequality is due to (1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)Tâ‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T)superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡12ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{T}\leq\exp{\left(-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}KT\right)}.

fâ€‹(xÂ¯T)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ‘¥ğ‘‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle f(\bar{x}_{T})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*}) â‰¤Î¼2â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)T+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±absentğœ‡2superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{\mu}{2}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{T}+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}
+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±]4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}]
â‰¤Î¼2â€‹expâ¡(âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T)+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±absentğœ‡212ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{\mu}{2}\exp{\left(-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}KT\right)}+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}
+4Î¼â€‹[L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±].4ğœ‡delimited-[]superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{4}{\mu}[L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}].

Let Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K=2â€‹cÎ¼â€‹lnâ¡(T)mâ€‹Kâ€‹Tğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2ğ‘ğœ‡ğ‘‡ğ‘šğ¾ğ‘‡\eta\eta_{L}K=\frac{2c}{\mu}\frac{\ln(T)}{mKT} (câ‰¥1ğ‘1c\geq 1 is a constant and Tâˆ’câˆ’2âˆ’2â€‹Î±Î±â‰¤m2âˆ’2â€‹Î±Î±â€‹K2Î±superscriptğ‘‡ğ‘22ğ›¼ğ›¼superscriptğ‘š22ğ›¼ğ›¼superscriptğ¾2ğ›¼T^{-c-\frac{2-2\alpha}{\alpha}}\leq m^{\frac{2-2\alpha}{\alpha}}K^{\frac{2}{\alpha}}), Î»=(mâ€‹Kâ€‹T)1Î±ğœ†superscriptğ‘šğ¾ğ‘‡1ğ›¼\lambda=(mKT)^{\frac{1}{\alpha}}, and Î·Lâ‰¤(mâ€‹Kâ€‹T)1âˆ’Î±Î±subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ‘šğ¾ğ‘‡1ğ›¼ğ›¼\eta_{L}\leq(mKT)^{\frac{1-\alpha}{\alpha}},

fâ€‹(xÂ¯T)âˆ’fâ€‹(ğ±âˆ—)ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ‘¥ğ‘‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±\displaystyle f(\bar{x}_{T})-f(\mathbf{x}_{*}) â‰¤1Tc+(mâ€‹Kâ€‹T)2âˆ’2â€‹Î±Î±â€‹lnâ¡(T)+(mâ€‹T)2âˆ’2â€‹Î±Î±â€‹K2Î±=ğ’ªâ€‹((mâ€‹T)2âˆ’2â€‹Î±Î±â€‹K2Î±).absent1superscriptğ‘‡ğ‘superscriptğ‘šğ¾ğ‘‡22ğ›¼ğ›¼ğ‘‡superscriptğ‘šğ‘‡22ğ›¼ğ›¼superscriptğ¾2ğ›¼ğ’ªsuperscriptğ‘šğ‘‡22ğ›¼ğ›¼superscriptğ¾2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{T^{c}}+(mKT)^{\frac{2-2\alpha}{\alpha}}\ln(T)+(mT)^{\frac{2-2\alpha}{\alpha}}K^{\frac{2}{\alpha}}=\mathcal{O}((mT)^{\frac{2-2\alpha}{\alpha}}K^{\frac{2}{\alpha}}).

âˆ

See 2

Proof.

Due to the smoothness in Assumption 1, taking expectation of fâ€‹(ğ±t+1)ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1f(\mathbf{x}_{t+1}) over the randomness at communication round tğ‘¡t, we have:

ğ”¼[f(ğ±t+1)]âˆ’f(ğ±t)â‰¤<âˆ‡f(ğ±t),ğ”¼[ğ±t+1âˆ’ğ±t]>+L2ğ”¼[âˆ¥ğ±t+1âˆ’ğ±tâˆ¥2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[f(\mathbf{x}_{t+1})]-f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\leq\big{<}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}),\mathbb{E}[\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-\mathbf{x}_{t}]\big{>}+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-\mathbf{x}_{t}\|^{2}]
=âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·L<âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t),ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]>+L2â€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]formulae-sequenceabsentğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=-\eta\eta_{L}\big{<}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}),\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\big{>}+\frac{L}{2}\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]
=âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·L2â€‹Kâ€‹â€–ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2+Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]absentğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ¾superscriptnormğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿22ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}}{2K}\|\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}+\frac{L\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}]
=âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2+(âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·L2â€‹K+Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L22)â€‹â€–ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2absentğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ¾ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿22superscriptnormğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}+\left(-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}}{2K}+\frac{L\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}}{2}\right)\|\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}
+Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2]ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿22ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\quad+\frac{L\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}}{2}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}]
â‰¤âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2+Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)âˆ’1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2âŸA1+Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L22â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2]âŸA2,absentğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾2subscriptâŸsuperscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2subscriptğ´1ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿22subscriptâŸğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2subscriptğ´2\displaystyle\leq-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}+\frac{\eta\eta_{L}K}{2}\underbrace{\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}}_{A_{1}}+\frac{L\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}}{2}\underbrace{\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}]}_{A_{2}}, (5)

where the last inequality follows from (âˆ’Î·â€‹Î·L2â€‹K+Lâ€‹Î·2â€‹Î·L22)â‰¤0ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿2ğ¾ğ¿superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿220\left(-\frac{\eta\eta_{L}}{2K}+\frac{L\eta^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}}{2}\right)\leq 0 if Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹Lâ‰¤1ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ¿1\eta\eta_{L}KL\leq 1.

From LemmaÂ 1, we have the bound of A1subscriptğ´1A_{1} and A2subscriptğ´2A_{2} in (5). By rearranging and telescoping, we have:

1Tâ€‹âˆ‘tâˆˆ[T]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–21ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡ğ”¼superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t\in[T]}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2} â‰¤2â€‹(fâ€‹(ğ±1)âˆ’fâ€‹(xT))Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T+(L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹G2+K2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+Lâ€‹Î·Lâ€‹K2â€‹G1+Î±â€‹Î»1âˆ’Î±)absent2ğ‘“subscriptğ±1ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ¾2superscriptğº1ğ›¼superscriptğœ†1ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left(f(\mathbf{x}_{1})-f(x_{T})\right)}{\eta\eta_{L}KT}+\left(L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{2}+K^{2}G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+L\eta_{L}K^{2}G^{1+\alpha}\lambda^{1-\alpha}\right)
+Lâ€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lmâ€‹(Kâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±).ğ¿ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ‘šğ¾superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\quad+\frac{L\eta\eta_{L}}{m}\left(KG^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}\right).

Suppose Î·â€‹Î·L=m2â€‹Î±âˆ’23â€‹Î±âˆ’2â€‹Kâˆ’Î±âˆ’23â€‹Î±âˆ’2â€‹Tâˆ’Î±3â€‹Î±âˆ’2,Î·Lâ‰¤(mâ€‹T)1âˆ’Î±3â€‹Î±âˆ’2â€‹K4âˆ’4â€‹Î±3â€‹Î±âˆ’2formulae-sequenceğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ‘š2ğ›¼23ğ›¼2superscriptğ¾ğ›¼23ğ›¼2superscriptğ‘‡ğ›¼3ğ›¼2subscriptğœ‚ğ¿superscriptğ‘šğ‘‡1ğ›¼3ğ›¼2superscriptğ¾44ğ›¼3ğ›¼2\eta\eta_{L}=m^{\frac{2\alpha-2}{3\alpha-2}}K^{\frac{-\alpha-2}{3\alpha-2}}T^{\frac{-\alpha}{3\alpha-2}},\eta_{L}\leq(mT)^{\frac{1-\alpha}{3\alpha-2}}K^{\frac{4-4\alpha}{3\alpha-2}}, and Î»=(mâ€‹K4â€‹T)13â€‹Î±âˆ’2ğœ†superscriptğ‘šsuperscriptğ¾4ğ‘‡13ğ›¼2\lambda=(mK^{4}T)^{\frac{1}{3\alpha-2}},

mintâˆˆ[T]â¡ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2â‰¤ğ’ªâ€‹((mâ€‹T)2âˆ’2â€‹Î±3â€‹Î±âˆ’2â€‹K4âˆ’2â€‹Î±3â€‹Î±âˆ’2).subscriptğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘‡ğ”¼superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2ğ’ªsuperscriptğ‘šğ‘‡22ğ›¼3ğ›¼2superscriptğ¾42ğ›¼3ğ›¼2\displaystyle\min_{t\in[T]}\mathbb{E}\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t})\|^{2}\leq\mathcal{O}((mT)^{\frac{2-2\alpha}{3\alpha-2}}K^{\frac{4-2\alpha}{3\alpha-2}}).

âˆ

A.2 Proof of ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³\mathsf{FAT}-ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€\mathsf{Clipping}-ğ–¯ğ–¨ğ–¯ğ–¨\mathsf{PI}

For ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³\mathsf{FAT}-ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€\mathsf{Clipping}-ğ–¯ğ–¨ğ–¯ğ–¨\mathsf{PI}, we have the following notions:

âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜\displaystyle\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k}) =minâ¡{1,Î»tâ€–âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–}â€‹âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik),âˆ‡~â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)=ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)];formulae-sequenceabsent1subscriptğœ†ğ‘¡normâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜~âˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ”¼delimited-[]~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜\displaystyle=\min\{1,\frac{\lambda_{t}}{\|\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|}\}\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k}),\tilde{\nabla}f(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})=\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})];

Î”tsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡\displaystyle\Delta_{t} =1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]Î”t,i,Î”~t=1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]Î”~t,iformulae-sequenceabsent1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscript~Î”ğ‘¡1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–\displaystyle=\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\Delta_{t,i},\tilde{\Delta}_{t}=\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}
ğ±t+1subscriptğ±ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1} =ğ±tâˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)=ğ±tâˆ’Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Î”~t.absentsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜subscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿subscript~Î”ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\eta_{L}\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\eta_{L}\tilde{\Delta}_{t}.
Lemma 2 (Bounded Variance of Stochastic Local Updates for ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³ğ–¥ğ– ğ–³\mathsf{FAT}-ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€ğ–¢ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ—‰ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—€\mathsf{Clipping}-ğ–¯ğ–¨ğ–¯ğ–¨\mathsf{PI}).

Assume fiâ€‹(ğ±,Î¾)subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ±ğœ‰f_{i}(\mathbf{x},\xi) satisfies the Bounded Î±âˆ’limit-fromğ›¼\alpha-Moment assumptionÂ 3, then we have:

ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}] â‰¤K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentsuperscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},
ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2} â‰¤Kmâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentğ¾ğ‘šsuperscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{K}{m}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},
â€–1Kâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(x)â€–2superscriptnorm1ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥2\displaystyle\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(x)\|^{2} â‰¤2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+2â€‹L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±.absent2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼12superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq 2G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+2L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}.
Proof.
ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~tâ€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}\|^{2}] =1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î”~t,iâ€–2]absent1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t,i}\|^{2}]
â‰¤1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆ[K]âˆ‡~â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±t,ij,Î¾t,ij)â€–2]absent1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ¾~âˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\mathbb{E}[\|\sum_{j\in[K]}\tilde{\nabla}f(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{j},\xi_{t,i}^{j})\|^{2}]
â‰¤Kmâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘jâˆˆ[K]ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±t,ij,Î¾t,ij)â€–2]absentğ¾ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnorm~âˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—2\displaystyle\leq\frac{K}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{j\in[K]}\mathbb{E}[\|\tilde{\nabla}f(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{j},\xi_{t,i}^{j})\|^{2}]
â‰¤K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentsuperscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},

where the last inequality follows from the fact that ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–2â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–Î±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±â‰¤GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{2}\leq\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}\leq G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha} (see Lemma 9 inÂ [22]).

ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î”~tâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[Î”~t]â€–2=ğ”¼â€‹â€–1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)âˆ’1mâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)â€–2ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscript~Î”ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]subscript~Î”ğ‘¡2ğ”¼superscriptnorm1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜1ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\Delta}_{t}-\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]\|^{2}=\mathbb{E}\left\|\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})-\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤1m2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)âˆ’âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)â€–2absent1superscriptğ‘š2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{m^{2}}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})-\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})\|^{2}
â‰¤1m2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–2absent1superscriptğ‘š2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{m^{2}}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{2}
â‰¤Kmâ€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absentğ¾ğ‘šsuperscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq\frac{K}{m}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},

where the first inequality follows from the fact that {âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)âˆ’âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)}~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜\{\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})-\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})\} form a martingale difference sequence (Lemma 4 in Â [3]), the second inequalities is due to ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Xâˆ’ğ”¼â€‹[X]â€–2]â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Xâ€–2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormğ‘‹ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘‹2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormğ‘‹2\mathbb{E}[\|X-\mathbb{E}[X]\|^{2}]\leq\mathbb{E}[\|X\|^{2}], and the third inequality follows from the fact that ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–2â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–Î±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±â‰¤GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{2}\leq\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}\leq G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha} (see Lemma 9 inÂ [22]).

âˆ¥1Kğ”¼[Î”~t]âˆ’âˆ‡f(x)âˆ¥2â‰¤âˆ¥1mâ€‹Kâˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K](âˆ‡~fi(ğ±t,ik)âˆ’fi(ğ±t))âˆ¥2\displaystyle\|\frac{1}{K}\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\Delta}_{t}]-\nabla f(x)\|^{2}\leq\left\|\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum{k\in[K]}\left(\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})-f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right)\right\|^{2}
â‰¤1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)âˆ’fiâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2absent1ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\left\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})-f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K](2â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)âˆ’âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)â€–2+2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik)âˆ’fiâ€‹(ğ±t)â€–2)absent1ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾2superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜22superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\left(2\left\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})-\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})\right\|^{2}+2\left\|\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k})-f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\|^{2}\right)
â‰¤2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+2â€‹L2â€‹1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]â€–ğ±t,ikâˆ’ğ±tâ€–2absent2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼12superscriptğ¿21ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾superscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜subscriptğ±ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq 2G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+2L^{2}\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\|\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k}-\mathbf{x}_{t}\|^{2}
â‰¤2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+2â€‹L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹1mâ€‹Kâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[m]âˆ‘kâˆˆ[K]â€–âˆ‘jâˆˆ[K]âˆ‡fâ€‹(xt,ij,Î¾t,ij)â€–2absent2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼12superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿21ğ‘šğ¾subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘šsubscriptğ‘˜delimited-[]ğ¾superscriptnormsubscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ¾âˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘—2\displaystyle\leq 2G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+2L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}\frac{1}{mK}\sum_{i\in[m]}\sum_{k\in[K]}\left\|\sum_{j\in[K]}\nabla f(x_{t,i}^{j},\xi_{t,i}^{j})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤2â€‹G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)+2â€‹L2â€‹Î·L2â€‹K2â€‹GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±,absent2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼12superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ¿2superscriptğ¾2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\displaystyle\leq 2G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)}+2L^{2}\eta_{L}^{2}K^{2}G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha},

where the forth inequality is due to â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±)âˆ’âˆ‡fiâ€‹(ğ±)â€–2â‰¤G2â€‹Î±â€‹Î»âˆ’2â€‹(Î±âˆ’1)superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ±âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ±2superscriptğº2ğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼1\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x})-\nabla f_{i}(\mathbf{x})\|^{2}\leq G^{2\alpha}\lambda^{-2(\alpha-1)} (see Lemma 9 inÂ [22]), and the last inequality follows from the fact that ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±t,ik,Î¾t,ik)â€–2â‰¤GÎ±â€‹Î»2âˆ’Î±ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ±ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ‘˜2superscriptğºğ›¼superscriptğœ†2ğ›¼\mathbb{E}\|\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{t,i}^{k},\xi_{t,i}^{k})\|^{2}\leq G^{\alpha}\lambda^{2-\alpha}. âˆ

Proof.

Similarly, we have the following one step iteration:

=4Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’Tâ€‹[1âˆ’(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)T]absent4ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡delimited-[]1superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle=\frac{4}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T}\left[1-\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{T}\right]
â‰¥4Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’Tâ€‹[1âˆ’expâ¡(âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹Kâ€‹T)]absent4ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡delimited-[]112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle\geq\frac{4}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T}\left[1-\exp{\left(-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}KT\right)}\right]
â‰¥2Î¼â€‹(1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Î·â€‹Î·Lâ€‹K)âˆ’T,absent2ğœ‡superscript112ğœ‡ğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ¿ğ¾ğ‘‡\displaystyle\geq\frac{2}{\mu}\left(1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\eta\eta_{L}K\right)^{-T},
